text.0: filling our hearts with health and joy may vāta breathe his balm on us.
text.1: may he prolong our days of life.
text.2: thou art our father vāta yea thou art a brother and a friend.
text.3: so give us strength that we may live.
text.4: the store of amṛta laid away yonder o vāta in thine home.
text.5: give us thereof that we may live.
